item.title: 【Requests】[REQ CAP] - AXS - Metal Massacre: The Story Behind the Legendary Album (broadcasted 2023-10-28)
item.description:
I don't know of any scene release, but I'm pretty sure someone must have ripped it and put it online somewhere.

I'm eternally grateful to whoever makes it available here, or points me in the correct direction to obtain it elsewhere.

"This year’s lineup is headlined by the premiere of Metal Massacre: The Story Behind the Legendary Album, making its network debut on October 28 at 9pE. Packed with all-star interviews, rare photos, the film tells the story of the groundbreaking 1982 Metal Massacre vinyl compilation-a sonic celebration of the burgeoning Los Angeles Metal scene, which helped launch the careers of iconic acts Metallica and Ratt, and ultimately led to the birth of the legendary independent record label Metal Blade Records. The film boasts priceless commentary and anecdotes from Metal Blade founder Brian Slagel and his friend and collaborator John Kornarens, two metalheads with a dream who made Metal Massacre a reality; as well as Metallica members Lars Ulrich and James Hetfield; Ratt frontman Stephen Pearcy; and Black N’ Blue singer Jamie St. James, among many others."
item.author: Winged
